description: A generic format for an EMS event.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD TANDEM-EMS-MIB::emsMessage TANDEM-EMS-MIB::trapSSID s EXAMPLE TANDEM-EMS-MIB::trapEventNumber s EXAMPL TANDEM-EMS-MIB::trapContentStandard s EXAMPLE TANDEM-EMS-MIB::trapSubject s EXAMPLE TANDEM-EMS-MIB::trapProcess s EXAMPLE TANDEM-EMS-MIB::trapGenerationtime s EXAMPLEEXAMPLEEXAMP TANDEM-EMS-MIB::trapCritical s EXAMPLE TANDEM-EMS-MIB::trapText s EXAMPLE

description: subsystem ID that generated the EMS event
variables.name: TANDEM-EMS-MIB::trapSSID

description: The value of the first subject token in
variables.name: TANDEM-EMS-MIB::trapSubject

description: The process name that generated the event
variables.name: TANDEM-EMS-MIB::trapProcess

description: GMT the event was generated, rendered
variables.name: TANDEM-EMS-MIB::trapGenerationtime

description: The text expansion of the EMS event
variables.name: TANDEM-EMS-MIB::trapText
